column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Thao - Thank you for the great review. I'm glad to know you enjoyed your visit with us. I especially appreciate your understanding that we are high-volume
column4: which means we do our best to keep the tables turning WITHOUT making anyone feel overly rushed. It's never easy
column5: and it's a particular balance that we struggle with daily. We hope you will visit us again the next time you're in town
column6: and as the great Lyle Lovett sings: "That's right
